description: Pawna is a scenic lake located in the Western Ghats, about 105 kilometers from Mumbai and 52 kilometers from Pune. It is a popular destination for camping, boating, and fishing. The lake is also surrounded by several forts, including Lohgad, Visapur, Tikona, and Tungi. Pawna is a great place to escape the hustle and bustle of city life and enjoy the peace and quiet of nature.
name: Pawna
